title: How to Make Thin Mint Cheesecake

text: First Layer Whip the cream cheese until smooth in a large bowl.  Add and combine the melted chocolate, cookies, vanilla, sugar, and eggs.  Be sure that everything is thoroughly beaten before pouring it over the crust.  Freeze the mixture.  Second Layer Preheat the oven to 325ºF/160ºC.  Whip the cream cheese until smooth in another large bowl.  Add and combine the chocolate chips, sugar, and sour cream until smooth again.  Thoroughly whisk in the peppermint extract, vanilla extract, and eggs.  Pour this layer onto the frozen first layer.  Bake for 1 1/2 hours. Allow to cool completely before chilling it in the refrigerator. Topping Whisk everything together in a medium bowl.  Spread over the cake evenly while the chocolate is still in its liquid form.  Keep the cake chilled until ready to serve. This allows the chocolate topping to harden. Finished.
